DataGroupDefinition.Name: Non-dietary exposures
DataGroupDefinition.Description: Non-dietary exposure data is provided per non-dietary surveys. Each non-survey has some general information about the exposed population and the origin of the non-dietary exposure data. Also, a number of properties, such as specific age groups, can be specified for a survey. To each non-dietary survey, non-dietary exposures can be linked. These exposures may originate from dermal, oral and/or inhalatory exposure routes.
